sentences.en: "Eat before JULY 14" was stamped on the label.
sentences.cn: 标签上盖有“7月14日前食用”的戳记。

sentences.en: Average weekly earnings rose by 1.5% in July.
sentences.cn: 7月份的平均周薪增长了1.5%。

sentences.en: Between July and August, oil product prices fell 0.2 per cent.
sentences.cn: 七八月间，石油产品价格下降了0.2％。

sentences.en: But from February through July, Joy sat around with nothing to do.
sentences.cn: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.en: Edward disappeared around 9.30pm on the 23rd of July.
sentences.cn: 爱德华失踪于7月23号晚上9点30分左右。

sentences.en: Execution by lethal injection is scheduled for July 30th.
sentences.cn: 定于7月30日执行注射死刑。

sentences.en: I got married last July.
sentences.cn: 我在刚过去的7月里结了婚。

sentences.en: I plan to graduate in July.
sentences.cn: 我计划在7月份毕业。

sentences.en: I started cropping my beans in July.
sentences.cn: 我7月份开始收割豆类作物。

sentences.en: In July 1957, we were married in New York.
sentences.cn: 我们于1957年7月在纽约举行了婚礼。

sentences.en: In July 1969, Neil Armstrong walked on the moon.
sentences.cn: 1969年7月，尼尔·阿姆斯特朗踏上了月球。

sentences.en: Laura came over to England last July.
sentences.cn: 去年7月劳拉来到英格兰。

sentences.en: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.cn: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。

sentences.en: Open 19th July–6th September, Sun to Thurs incl.
sentences.cn: 7月19日至9月6日期间周日至周四开放。

sentences.en: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.cn: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.en: Take cuttings from it in July or August.
sentences.cn: 7月或8月时从它上边剪一些插枝。

sentences.en: The crisis peaked in July 1974.
sentences.cn: 那场危机在1974年7月达到巅峰。

sentences.en: The exhibition continues until 25 July.
sentences.cn: 展览要持续到7月25日。

sentences.en: The movie hits the big screen in July.
sentences.cn: 这部电影于七月份在影院上映。

sentences.en: The two sides signed a peace accord last July.
sentences.cn: 在刚过去的七月，双方签订了和平条约。

sentences.en: We have extended the time limit for claims until July 30.
sentences.cn: 我们已经把索赔期限延长到了7月30日。

trans.tran_en: the seventh month of the year, between June and August
the seventh month of the year, between June and August
